ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] emergency: please read reguarding new bard songs
ygData.msgSnippet: Not sure if it was suggested yet but I would like: -A song that does a large heal to your target at the expense of all your mana. -A song that will decrease a
ygData.messageBody:
Not sure if it was suggested yet but I would like:
-A song that does a large heal to your target at the expense of all your mana.
-A song that will decrease a mobs hate list. Something where if your
caster is getting beat on it would lower them on the creatures hate list
making it easier to taunt off. Just lower it, not wipe them off the hate
list, don't want to tread on enchanters.


At 06:57 PM 3/20/00 -0800, you wrote:
>From: Tork <tdomeii@...>
>
>Nameless crashed tonight and in the chat room
>GM-Hideaki was there. He and GZ were brainstorming on
>ideas for new bard songs (they were in the same room).
> I told him we could help, and that I'd email him our
>best ideas.
>
>Please email directly to me (gww6e@...) your
>ideas. Please please please don't waste this
>opportunity. The bind song is an option, its been
>covered actually and was proposed to me for my ideas.
>
>Thanks for your hastly responces,
>-Tork@Nameless
>
>PS: info on songs to follow, got them straight from
>the horses mouth.
>
>PPS: Clouding provides no invis vs undead peroid.
>
